author: slava77
body:
- map file updated to include
    - the HI repacking emulation workflow 140.55
    - the highBetaStar 2018 workflows from the commissioning2018 data
- validate.C updates
    - switch to ```detId().subdetId()``` in calo rechit plots to avoid massive memory leaks via TCling
    - add reco::Track t0 and beta plots (part of MTD integration)
    - add RP timing detector plots for digis and rechits and update other PPS rechit plots
title: reco comparisons: avoid mem leaks; add track time and PPS timing plotsComparisons 4 oct2018
